Name: ApiGatewayRestApiS3Location
Documentation: S3Location is a property of the AWS::ApiGateway::RestApi resource that specifies the Amazon Simple Storage Service (Amazon S3) location of a Swagger file that defines a set of RESTful APIs in JSON or YAML for an Amazon API Gateway (API Gateway) RestApi.

Parameters.Name: Bucket
Parameters.Documentation: The name of the S3 bucket where the Swagger file is stored.

Parameters.Name: ETag
Parameters.Documentation: The Amazon S3 ETag (a file checksum) of the Swagger file. If you don't specify a value, API Gateway skips ETag validation of your Swagger file.

Parameters.Name: Key
Parameters.Documentation: The file name of the Swagger file (Amazon S3 object name).

Parameters.Name: Version
Parameters.Documentation: For versioning-enabled buckets, a specific version of the Swagger file.
